attributes.action: Resign while we still have a country that has not fallen into anarchy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Gordon Brown and his party are not very different to Mr Magabe and his party, they are looking after themselves with good big fat pensions, look at his other crony Blair, the world is his oyster now and Brown will know doubt be expecting the same when he eventually goes.
They are all the same and Brown is not interested in attempting to put it right it is now the E.U. ministers who refuse to show their expences, I believe the annual accounts for the E.U. have not been accepted and signed off by the official auditors for quite some years, no legitimate company in the U.K. would be allowed to do that by what used to be our law, but I am not sure if we have any laws left to enforce.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
